resources.string: More Americans use Android than ios mobile device
An Android device created by Samsung may have different UI than an Android device created by LG.
Android and IOS apps are downloaded from the same app store.
Android App may only be downloaded from Google play store.
Apples App store places many restrictions on mobile apps.
